name: Modular Character Editor - Browser Version
description:
This is a small experimental app created to test jiggle physics, mesh and material customization, and modular clothes and hairstyles.

Unfortunately, the character ended up looking a little too creepy and the jiggle physics are way too weird. I'm sorry!

This is a test for my new project, a city-building/strategy game featuring customizable, modular units and buildings.

If you're interested in my projects, please visit my patreon:
https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

There's also a Windows version available, with higher quality graphics: https://lexferreira89.itch.io/waifu-maker-windows-version

3D assets, textures and code all made by me. 3D made in Blender. Game developed in Godot.

Source code and 3D models available at:
https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

https://gumroad.com/lexferreira89

Made by LexFerreira89 - August 2020
